CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 12, 1958, pg. 28 reads: "Easter Thrills, Frills - This group of primary youngsters of Brushton Methodist Church School, singing Easter tunes, had a thousand parallels in junior edition of Pittsburgh's church world on Easter Sunday. Mrs. Marion Langdon leads the singing, with Mrs. Paul Snyder at the organ. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait eight boys and twelve girls singing, with Marion Langdon and Mrs. Paul Snyder playing organ, in Brushton Methodist Church School
